channel.title: Looking For Development Team
channel.description:
[b]Okay so here's whats happening.[/b]
I'm looking for a team to create a massive pvp/mvp server. what I'm looking for-
614 coder/developer x2.
web designer/forums coder x2.
everyone knows no body likes to play much of the 317 servers anymore because they are just simply not cool enough, now days everyone is playing the 614+ servers but a few still play 317 servers, i want to spend about 3 months minimum coding the server making sure everything works, simply have the lastest and greatest pvp'ing equipment + all working bosses.
Items. Chaotics Bandos GodSwords SaraSwords PolyPore Staff All Nex Armours All Barrows All Dragon Armour Tele Tabs etc. pretty much all Runescape items except a few of the very latest ones.
Bosses. Full Working GodWars Barrows Nex Corp KBD Kalphite Queen Daggoneth King Tormented Demons etc. everyone knows the bosses.
Know a lil info on the actual server. like most others its eco or spawn, a few of them have spawn/pkp points. i want to create a spawn server with PKP. so like bronze-rune dragon-barrows all spawn. vestas-Nex drag claws-korasi all pkp.
home i want to be bounty hunter. and work on from there where all skilling training areas will be, id like for people to help with ideas aswell. tell me where they would like to put stuff aswell.
if you interested at all please dont hesitate to add me on skype/msn
Skype- mother-bitch-mah-dick
Msn- Daniel_rulz95@hotmail.com
also please reply on here
Name- What your applying for- how old you are- what you have acheived prior to this- country- something about yourself-
thank you and hope to see some people keen on helping.

item.title: Looking For Development Team
item.dc:creator: @ford_rock99 ford rock99
item.description:
@ford_rock99 wrote:

already gotchya on skype aj cordio im daniel

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For Development Team
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Name- The Web Guy / Real name is AJ
What your applying for- Website/Forums developer
how old you are- 15 years old (never let age fool you)
what you have acheived prior to this- I’ve released several things website related to moparscape, including various different Highscores themes, the entire runescape website (updated one), tutorials, and more. I’ve coded my own social network front to back (took 3 months; reached 60k users in 3 weeks). I also run my own business doing website design, me and a team of employees make fairly good money, I help out people with RSPS sites however, offering free websites/forums for them, in exchange for something in-game or possibly a rank. (Wouldn’t ask for real life money)
country- United States, Wisconsin.
something about yourself- I’m 15, however I usually don’t tend to act my age (I act older), sound my age, or even look my age for that matter. I’ve accomplished quite a bit for age 15, I know everything about computers, branching off into Networking, Website Design, Programming, Hardware, and even some Software. I have my own business with 9 employees that I myself employ. So I tend not to take highschool so seriously, lol.

Read full topic
